original_text: The king’s command was so urgent and the furnace so hot that the flames of the fire killed the soldiers who took up Shadrach, Meshach and Abednego,
korean_text: 왕의 명령이 엄하고 풀무불이 심히 뜨거우므로 불꽃이 사드락과 메삭과 아벳느고를 붙든 사람을 태워 죽였고

sentences.original_text: The king's command was so urgent
that the flames of the fire killed the soldiers
who took up Shadrach, Meshach and Abednego
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 사드락과 메삭과 아벳느고를 데려간 군사들입니다
